fields.mail_body:
Congratulations!

You succesfully created a new account. Please write down the following credentials. These are only known to you:

Username: {{ profile.username }} (HWIOS Username)
Password: {{ profile.raw_password }} (HWIOS/OpenSim PW)
First name: {{ profile.first_name }} (OpenSim First name)
Last name: {{ profile.last_name }} (OpenSim Last name)
{% ifequal activation_type 0 %} {% else %} {% ifequal activation_type 1 %}

In Order to activate, please open this link in your browser...

{% else %} {% ifequal activation_type 2 %}

Your registration request was sent to a moderator for further processing. You will be notified when the account request is approved. Thank you for your patience...

{% endifequal %} {% endifequal %} {% endifequal %}
